Module hanyaeger
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api

Class Coordinate2D

java.lang.Object
javafx.geometry.Point2D
com.github.hanyaeger.api.Coordinate2D
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.animation.Interpolatable<javafx.geometry.Point2D>
public class Coordinate2D extends javafx.geometry.Point2D
A Coordinate2D is a 2D geometric point that represents a pair of coordinates.

    • add

      public Coordinate2D add(Coordinate2D location)
      Returns a Coordinate2D with the coordinates of the specified point added to the coordinates of this Coordinate2D.
      Parameters:
      location - the Coordinate2D those coordinates are to be added
      Returns:
      the Coordinate2D with the added coordinates throws NullPointerException if the specified Coordinate2D is null

      Returns:

    • divide

      public Coordinate2D divide(Coordinate2D location) throws NullPointerException, IllegalArgumentException
      Return a Coordinate2D with the coordinates of the specified point divided by the coordinates of this Coordinate2D.
      Parameters:
      location - the Coordinate2D with the divided coordinates
      Returns:
      the Coordinate2D with the divided coordinates throws NullPointerException if the specified Coordinate2D is null throws IllegalArgumentException if an X,Y component of either coordinate is 0
      Throws:
      NullPointerException
      IllegalArgumentException

    • middlePoint

      public Coordinate2D middlePoint(Coordinate2D location) throws NullPointerException
      Returns a Coordinate2D which lies in the middle between this Coordinate2D and the specified Coordinate2D.
      Parameters:
      location - is the other endpoint as a Coordinate2D
      Returns:
      the coordinate in the middle. throws NullPointerException if the specified Coordinate2D is null
      Throws:
      NullPointerException

    • invert

      public Coordinate2D invert()
      Return a Coordinate2D which is the inverse of this coordinate
      Returns:

      Returns:
